column4: this isnt really an ubuntu specific question, but anyhow , ive lost a ext4 partition, what tools are available to do file recovery  (hopefully whole partition recovery, but if not , file will do)
gentoo it had not long started a 'move ' in gparted when someone knocked the keyboard off the bed and hit the cancel key
i think that the partition has been relabelled, infacti  can see it has
